item.title: Synology NAS Series – Cloud Sync with Azure Storage
item.author: michael@datachain.consulting (Michael John Peña)
item.description: Foreword Synology reached out to me to give their new DiskStation DS920+ a review. If you’re not yet aware of Synology, they are the leading NAS (Network-attached storage) provider for home and work use-cases.
